locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explains the concept of 'reckoning' (logizomai) in Romans 4, using the example of Abraham to dismantle religious hierarchies and establish the justification of the ungodly.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. The preacher correctly identifies the unconditional nature of the promise and the forensic nature of justification.

illocutie.beschrijving: The preacher moves from describing the historical/exegetical 'reckoning' to applying it as a present reality for the congregation.
voorbeelden: God has unilaterally reckoned us righteous.
In this word lies my deliverance, and yours.
Your prayers are just as good as mine.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Relief from religious anxiety, assurance of salvation, and communal motivation for a capital campaign based on grace rather than merit.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Moderate; implied through the 'power in this name' and the 'pouring out of grace'.

voorbeelden: Abraham was considered to be the model.
Paul found a word in Genesis 15:6.
May we all offer our prayers as one prayer.
May we pray that our parish...
It makes most of us very uncomfortable.
It is always a very special joy to bring this message.
He just said, 'I will bless you.'
He has unilaterally reckoned us righteous.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strong. The preacher explicitly links God's past promise to the hearer's present reality.

voorbeelden: Your faith is reckoned to you as righteousness.
In this word lies my deliverance, and yours.
declaratieven.autoriteit: High. The preacher concludes by speaking in the persona of God/The Father.

indicatoren: Detailed explanation of the Greek word logizomai
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is well-informed about the doctrine, but the 'event' is delayed until the final third of the sermon.

missende_elementen: Direct absolution earlier in the text
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Assurance is achieved, but requires the hearer to follow a long intellectual path first.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Excellent. The 'Toezegging' (Promise) is the climax of the sermon.
voorbeelden: God... has said to us, 'Your faith is reckoned to you as righteousness.'

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal anecdotes and 'we' as a community of sinners.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Directly addressing the hearer's status before God.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to apply the 'reckoning' to the listener's specific life and prayers.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Abraham, Paul, and the basement man.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a narrative distance that is eventually bridged by the 'logizomai' application.

actueel_present.gebruik: The current moment of the capital campaign and the 'now' of the Gospel.

foutief_patroon.probleem: The preacher avoids moralism by grounding the 'doing' in the 'reckoning'.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Assertive (Abraham's story) -> Commissive (God's promise) -> Declarative (You are reckoned righteous) -> Directive (Building project/Good works).
voorbeelden: God... has unilaterally reckoned us righteous... Now it is time for us to think about what we want to engrave logizomai on.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: For those who have really felt the force of the divine logizomai... the new life in Christ can only take shape as an intense longing to do good.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a sacramental event because it does not just talk about justification; it attempts to 'reckon' the hearer righteous through the proclamation of the Word.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: He has unilaterally reckoned us righteous.
sterke_punten.effect: Creates a foundation of certainty for the hearer.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The first two pages are heavily anecdotal and historical.
zwakke_punten.probleem: Risk of losing the 'event' character in favor of a lecture.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The final paragraph shifts into a declarative mode where the preacher speaks for God, making the sermon an encounter.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The use of 'logizomai' as a performative word that 'overtakes and surpasses' human effort is highly sacramental.

openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Yes, the preacher acts as the one authorized to announce the 'reckoning'.
tekstueel_bewijs: the Father... has said to us, 'Your faith is reckoned to you as righteousness.'

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: The preacher trusts the 'force' of the word to create the 'longing to do good'.
tekstueel_bewijs: May we above all receive into our hearts the astonishing news.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, the sermon is treated as the vehicle for the 'divine reckoning'.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Yes, the word 'logizomai' is treated as an epiphanic reality.
tekstueel_bewijs: In this word... lies my deliverance, and yours.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is heavy on past-tense assertives in the beginning but successfully transitions to present-tense performatives.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: Abraham was not righteous... until God reckoned him righteous.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: You are not righteous by your own hand, but here and now, God reckons you righteous.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a historical description to a present-tense event.

toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Maintain the current strength of the conclusion.
voorbeeldzinnen: I declare to you that God has reckoned your account full.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: The 'basement man' story is a bit long.
adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Connect the anecdote more quickly to the 'you' of the congregation.
voorbeeldzinnen: Like my friend in the basement, you might feel far from God, but...

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: The link between grace and the capital campaign is handled with exceptional theological care.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This is a masterclass in performative preaching. It moves from the 'talking about' of exegesis to the 'doing' of the Gospel.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' about his basement; SAT focuses on the 'Declarative' act of God's justification.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: It doesn't just persuade the audience to give money; it 'reckons' them into a state where giving is a natural response to grace.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the word 'logizomai' is not just a concept to be understood, but a Commissive act where God binds Himself to the sinner.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: He has unilaterally reckoned us righteous.

appendices.notities: The sermon successfully navigates the 'Crisis of Constative Surplus' by using the surplus as a runway for a powerful performative takeoff.
